name: Stephanie
description: Stephanie deals with sculptures, traditional painting, mural, illustration and satirical drawing.Between 1989-1994 she studied at the Academy of Fine Arts,In the works of Stephanie, the interaction of psychological arts appears. She often refers to the poetics of rejection, thus situating thus, in a social discourse on the subject of values.
lastExhibition: 2015: Playground nr 2. Recycling objects, Gallery XX1. Kuchnia, Warsaw, Poland
